channel.title: Baldurs Gate 1 on Jefklaks Codex
channel.description: Recent content in Baldurs Gate 1 on Jefklaks Codex

item.title: Experiencing the Enhanced Baldur's Gate
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: We move from one tree to the other, carefully glancing towards the ever so black fog of war. Imoen investigates things for us, while we prepare for the inevitable. Then, a sudden scream. Our friend is in sudden need of help! To battle! Or, as the more evil aligned main protagonist would say, ‘Oh well. Imoen had it coming. At least she can stop saying “good on you if you save the day” now.
